isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM: 5000i, 9100i, 9200i, 9400i, 9900i MODELS - Starting 03/01/1999 - AIR CONDITIONING SYSTEM SERVICE

svcsubsecinfo.para: This manual covers the air conditioning - heating system for the 5000i Series models and 9000i Series models (daycabs and sleepers). These models use the lowered heater box system. This system uses a single blower and can be identified by the side access cover for the system filter.

Use s16015 (CTS-5070), AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM, for 5000 Series and 9000 Series Models WITHOUT the Lowered Heater Box HVAC System (Day Cabs, Add-On Sleeper Boxes, and pre-5/1/1997 Pro-Sleepers)
Use s16020 (CTS-5255), AIR CONDITIONING - HEATER SYSTEM, for 9000 Series Pro-Sleeper Models After 5/1/1997 (WITH the Lowered Heater Box HVAC System)
